contents.content: 第四部分 特殊规则
第一章 强调句
第二节 真题分析
一、雅思阅读真题分析10例
Example 1
真题回放：When the water level was high, the user needed only to descend a few steps to reach it; when it was low, several levels would have to be negotiated. （剑10阅读）

contents.title: 提高道路安全的唯一途径就是对违反规则的行为进行严惩。
contents.answer: ：The only way to improve the safety on the roads is to give much stricter punishments for driving offences.

contents.content: 语法破解：分号前是一个主从复合句，When引导的是时间状语从句，主句中的only修饰不定式短语to descend a few steps，表示强调。分号后是一个主从复合句，when引导的是时间状语从句。分号前后的句子是同等关系。
Example 2
真题回放：Yet in order to learn by themselves, the gifted do need some support from their teachers. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，do need是“do+动词原形”，表示强调谓语need。
Example 3

真题回放：Although groups around the world have been searching intermittently for three decades, it is only now that we have reached the level of technology where we can make a determined attempt to search all nearby stars for any sign of life. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。Although引导的是让步状语从句；it is…that是强调句型，强调状语only now；where引导的是定语从句，修饰technology。
Example 4
真题回放：It was not until the spring of that year that she was introduced to Pierre Curie. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个It was not until…that 结构的强调句，强调的是时间the spring of that year。
Example 5

真题回放：This definition implies that iconoclasts are different from other people, but more precisely, it is their brains that are different in three distinct ways：perception, fear response, and social intelligence. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：but前是一个主从复合句，that引导的是宾语从句，作动词implies的宾语；but后是一个it is…that结构的强调句型，强调的是主语their brains；but前后的句子是转折关系。
Example 6
真题回放：It was only thirty years ago that the building industry felt confident enough to erect office blocks of steel and reinforced concrete that had more than a dozen floors. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。It was…that是强调句型，强调的是状语only thirty years ago；第二个that引导的是定语从句，修饰office blocks of steel and reinforced concrete。
Example 7
真题回放：Similarly, noise did not affect a subject's ability to track a moving line with a steering wheel, but it did interfere with the subject's ability to repeat numbers while tracking. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是由but连接的两个简单句组成的并列句。在but后的句子中，did interfere with是“did+动词原形”，表示强调谓语interfere with。
Example 8
真题回放：Never before has the planet's linguistic diversity shrunk at such a pace. （剑4阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，否定副词Never位于句首，句子倒装，助动词has放到主语的前面，表示强调。
Example 9

真题回放：In this way, the recreational pilot who simply wishes to go flying for a while without all the restrictions imposed by the FAA has only to stay in uncontrolled airspace, below 365m, while the pilot who does want the protection afforded by ATC can easily enter the controlled airspace. （剑8阅读）

语法破解：while前是一个主从复合句，who引导的是定语从句，修饰pilot，该从句中的simply是副词，修饰谓语动词wishes，表示强调；主句中的only也是副词，修饰不定式to stay，表示强调。while后也是一个主从复合句，who引导的是定语从句，修饰pilot，该从句中的does want是“does+动词原形”，表示强调谓语want；主句中的easily是副词，修饰动词enter，表示强调。while前后的句子是对比关系。
Example 10
真题回放：To stop the laser itself being struck, it would not be pointed straight at the clouds. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，itself是反身代词，作宾语the laser的同位语，表示强调宾语。
二、雅思听力真题分析10例
Example 1
真题回放：Well, if you want to stand a good chance of winning you really need a model of the machine. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。if引导的是条件状语从句；主句中的really是副词，修饰谓语need，表示强调。
Example 2
真题回放：I had a friend who missed the deadline and didn't get her first choice, so you do need to get a move on at that stage. （剑10听力）
语法破解：so前面是一个主从复合句，who引导的是定语从句，修饰a friend；so后面是一个简单句，do need是“do+动词原形”，表示强调谓语need；so前后的句子是因果关系。
Example 3
真题回放：It wasn't until the Industrial Revolution, when a tremendous need for metals of all kinds developed, that Manham expanded to become one of the busiest ports in the country. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句是It wasn't until…that结构的强调句型，强调状语the Industrial Revolution；when引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰the Industrial Revolution。
Example 4
真题回放：It was practically a year ago that I applied to my local council for a grant, and it took them six months to turn me down. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句；and前是一个It was…that结构的强调句型，强调状语practically a year ago；and前后的句子是同等关系。
Example 5
真题回放：But it wasn't until the 1950s that the idea of an international treaty was proposed. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个it wasn't until…that结构的强调句型，强调时间the 1950s。
Example 6
真题回放：But it wasn't until 1908 that the ingredient in kombu which was responsible for the improvement in flavour was actually discovered to be glutamate by scientists working there. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句是it wasn't until…that结构的强调句型，强调时间1908；which引导的是定语从句，修饰kombu。
Example 7
真题回放：It was the availability, rather than the condition, of the housing that was the major concern for tenants and landlords alike. （剑6听力）
语法破解：这是一个It was…that结构的强调句型，强调主语the availability of the housing。
Example 8
真题回放：Some health centres do offer alternative therapies like homeopathy as part of their pay-to-use service. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，do offer是“do+动词原形”，强调谓语offer。
Example 9
真题回放：I think that having to do a seminar presentation really helped me. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作动词think的宾语；该从句中的副词really修饰谓语helped，表示强调。
Example 10
真题回放：The Centre itself is a huge complex that caters for a great range of arts. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的itself是反身代词，作主语The Centre的同位语，强调主语；that引导的是定语从句，修饰a huge complex。
三、雅思写作和口语中的强调句
在雅思写作和口语中，强调句也是很重要的加分句型。
下面我们就举例讲解强调句的具体应用。
点评：这是一个It is…that结构的强调句型，强调主语eating more junk food。该句常用于写作、口语的“食品类和生活类”话题中。
点评：这是一个主从复合句。主句是It was not until…that结构的强调句型，强调的是时间状语1983；which引导的是非限制性定语从句。该句常用于地图题写作中。
点评：这是一个简单句，“do appreciate”是“do+动词原形”，强调谓语appreciate。该句常用于书信作文的写作中。
点评：这是一个主从复合句，主句中的“do support”是“do+动词原形”，强调谓语support。该句常用于写作、口语的“健康类”话题中。
点评：这是一个主从复合句，if引导的是条件状语从句，其中的do和really都表示强调。该句常用于写作、口语的“科技类和教育类”话题中。
点评：这是一个简单句，only表示强调。该句常用于写作、口语的“交通类”话题中。
